name: Filterize Gallery
author: sunil25393

sections.description:
DESCRIPTION

This plugin Provide Filterable gallery Functionality.

KEY Advantages and Benefits:

  • Very easy to use
  • Multiple option for customization
  • Able to Add color Option
  • Able to Create multiple gallery

User “[fg_gallery]” Shortcode to display gallery on page or post or anywhere on website.
sections.installation:
Steps to Install Plugin.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Filterize Gallery screen to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
how to add Gallery to page ?

User Shortcode “[fg_gallery]” to display gallery on page or post or anywhere in website.

That’s it.
